General.Name: Grand Foundry Limited
General.Description: Grand Foundry Limited manufactures, exports, and sells stainless steel bright bars and wires in India, the United States, Japan, Singapore, Italy, Australia, and Canada. The company's products are used in various applications in the petrochemical, oil and natural gas, and automotive industries. It also offers pickling and heat treatment line services. The company was incorporated in 1973 and is based in Mumbai, India.
